name: Inp
query:
SELECT 
    inp.name AS "SN:Link/Inpatient Record:200",
    S.posting_date AS "Date:Date:100", 
    S.patient AS "Patient:Data:100", 
    S.patient_name AS "Patient Name:Data:220", 
    inp.room AS "Room:Data:200",
    inp.bed AS "Bed:Data:250",
    inp.admission_practitioner AS "Doctor:Data:250"

FROM 
    `tabSales Invoice` S
JOIN 
    `tabSales Invoice Item` I ON S.name = I.parent
JOIN 
    `tabHealthcare Service Unit Type` R ON I.item_code = R.item  
JOIN 
    `tabInpatient Record` inp ON S.inpatient_record = inp.name  

WHERE 
    S.docstatus = 1
    AND S.posting_date BETWEEN %(Start_date)s AND %(End_date)s;
